about_the_game:
Pin another window when the game is idle so that the other window appears in front of the game you're playing. Imagine that.

You can play while watching the guide, watch videos while playing, and watch anime while playing. Of course, you can also play while studying.

It is especially suitable for use when the game content becomes boring, which can not only get another kind of fun, but also do not affect the progress of the game content being played.

The software is locally offline, can be started separately, no other content, easy to uninstall, small size, small occupation.

The software has unique features. Switch to the game window, and the window to be pinned to the top will automatically penetrate the mouse, even if it blocks the game interface, it will not affect your operation of the game; Switching to the sticky window will automatically allow you to manipulate the window with your mouse. Allows you to seamlessly switch between windows.

Cooperate with the function of changing the transparency of the sticky window. You don't need to worry about the contents of the game window being blocked by a window. Even if you don't like to use this feature, you can use the shortcut keys to cancel the pinned window.

The software also has a function to delineate the range of mouse movements. It is designed for some players who prefer to play games with a window, but the mouse will always go out of the window.

It is not only useful for gaming, but also for office.

I hope you enjoy this software, Alt+Tab, is the key to using this software.
